Reduced map image opacity for heatmaps

Heatmaps are difficult to see at times, particularly on the Radiant side, due to the high green contrast of the map. Slightly darkened the map (reduced opacity) to cause the heat map information to pop more easily.

repo_list.description: "Ack in Project" TextMate bundle

Active Merchant is a simple payment abstraction library used in and sponsored by Shopify. It is written by Tobias Luetke, Cody Fauser, and contributors. The aim of the project is to feel natural to Ruby users and to abstract as many parts as possible away from the user to offer a consistent interface across all supported gateways.
ActiveModel::Serializer implementation and Rails hooks
Intuitive extensions and utilities to handle money in multiple currencies for Ruby on Rails
DotA Slack Integration App
Ruby gem and command-line application for Filepreviews.io
Git tool to track the merge state of feature branches with environment branches.
Ruby framework to run tasks after pushing to a git repository
Capistrano deploy module for git-runner
Automatically exported from code.google.com/p/google-id-token
Ruby library to validate hashes (Hash) against user-defined requirements
Add state constraints to an ActiveRecord model, as well as providing named_scopes, boolean accessors and other functionality from the defined states
A content management extension for Rails, unobtrusively adding static (page) and dynamic (post) content retrieval and management
A library for loading data from a JSON API datasource.
Easy file attachment management for ActiveRecord
Material design for react, powered by materializecss
Command line tool for quickly fetching and displaying vital host metrics
Dota bot integration for Slack
